title: Laws About Bodily Discharges
summary: Leviticus 15 describes laws concerning bodily discharges from both men and women. These laws emphasize physical and ceremonial cleanliness and the need for washing and offerings after healing.

faq.question: Why are bodily discharges considered unclean?
faq.answer: They symbolize impurity and require cleansing to approach Godâ€™s presence in worship.

faq.question: How did someone become clean again?
faq.answer: Through washing, waiting a period of time, and offering sacrifices if necessary.
